name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in building and deploying robust, scalable, and secure software solutions. Proficient in **React**, **TypeScript**, **CI/CD**, **AWS**, **Git**, and **SQL**, with extensive knowledge of **microservices**, **asynchronous architectures**, and cloud-native application design. Skilled in Agile methodologies, TDD, and BDD, ensuring high-quality code through rigorous testing practices. Experienced in leveraging **AI/ML** technologies and implementing **micro-frontends** for enhanced user experiences. Strong command over **Unix/Linux**, **Kubernetes**, and **Docker**, enabling streamlined deployment and management of applications.

Demonstrated expertise in leading enterprise-level projects in healthcare and finance sectors, focusing on compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Adept at utilizing design patterns and SOLID principles to create maintainable codebases. Passionate about driving technology innovation that delivers real-world value.
